title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-d - Temporary order of observation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-d - Temporary order of observation

State Regulations
CPL Article 730
FORM 16-d
12/88
TEMPORARY ORDER OF OBSERVATION
________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________x
PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, TEMPORARY
ORDER
OF OBSERVATION
-against-
________, Docket No. ________
Defendant. ________x

The above named defendant, having been charged
with ________, in violation of ________, and having been examined pursuant to
an order of this Court by ________ psychiatric examiners, qualified in
accordance with law, and examination reports thereon having been made to this

Court, and the District Attorney and counsel for the defendant having been
given copies of such examination reports, copies of which are hereto
attached, (Strike out one of the following two
paragraphs)
AND no motion for a hearing having been
made, AND a hearing having been held on the ________
day of ________and the following persons having appeared ____________
____________
____________
AND it appearing to my satisfaction that the
said defendant as a result of mental disease or defect lacks capacity to
understand the proceedings against (him) (her) or to assist in (his) (her) own
defense, AND it further appearing that a felony
complaint has been filed against the defendant, NOW, on motion of ____________, it is
ORDERED that the above named defendant be
committed to the care and custody of the Commissioner of (OMH) (OMRDD) for care
and treatment in an appropriate facility of the (OMH) (OMRDD) to be designated
by the appropriate Commissioner for a period not to exceed ninety days from the
date of this order, and it is further
ORDERED that if the person in charge of the
facility in which the defendant is confined determines at any time that the
defendant is no longer an incapacitated person, such person shall give notice
in writing of such determination to this Court and to the District Attorney, and it is further
ORDERED that the defendant, if (he) (she) be
in detention, be continued in detention at ________, pending designation of an
appropriate facility by the Commissioner of (OMH) (OMRDD), and upon notice by
the Commissioner of the designated facility be delivered thereto by the
(Sheriff) (Commissioner of Correction of the City of New York). Dated: ____________
_________
Judge or Justice

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
16-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
